thread.title: Very good location near the Eiffel Tower
thread.title_full: Very good location near the Eiffel Tower - Review of Grand Hotel Leveque, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Besnik V
title: Very good location near the Eiffel Tower
text: I stayed there for 5 nights and had incredible time in Paris. Rooms are small but i was single so it was good enough. Everyone in reception was english speaking and very helpful about everything you need for Paris. The only thing i didnt like was the elevator which was too tight and barely one person could enter in it. Otherwise, everything was ok and is value for money.
